sys_hub_flow.description:
- if the Group column is used: for each member of the group create a record in the User assignment table and fill the Assignment and User columns
- if the User column is used: only for the user create a record in the User assignment table and fill the Assignment and User columns
(Active should be set to true on the new records created)

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.description:
- if the Group column is used: for each member of the group create a record in the User assignment table and fill the Assignment and User columns
- if the User column is used: only for the user create a record in the User assignment table and fill the Assignment and User columns
(Active should be set to true on the new records created)
